product.title: Electric Bubble Gun Rocket Machine Kids Toy
product.body_html:
• Description
  • FAQ
  • Shipping

  • Do they love playing with bubbles?

    This Electric Bubble Gun toy is a fun and entertaining toy for children. It operates using electricity and produces a stream of bubbles when you press the trigger - how cool is that! You won't believe how many bubbles this gun will produce in a matter of seconds. Get yours today and show it off to your family and friends.

    This toy is designed to be easy for children to use and is suitable for children aged 3 and up. It is made of durable plastic and has a comfortable grip for little hands. The electric bubble gun rocket machine is a great way for both adults and kids to play and have fun outdoors or indoors. It is also a great tool for developing hand-eye coordination and fine motor skills in young children.

    Overall, the bubble machine gun is a fun and engaging toy that will provide hours of entertainment. Available in two colors.

    ✨ Measures 34 x 28 x 15cm
    ✨ Automatic Trigger
    ✨ 40 holes to produce bubbles
    ✨ Rechargeable 7.4V Lithium Battery
    ✨ Made from plastic
    ✨ Lanyard included
    ✨ Powered by 4 engines
    ✨ Bottle included which attaches to the gun 

    Simply fill up the bottle with the bubble solution provided, plug the battery into the handle, and press the trigger.

     

  • Do you ship worldwide? Yes, we ship to over 300 countries and are proud to provide free shipping to the United States, the United Kingdom, Australia, New Zealand, and many countries in Europe.

    Does this help with stress and development?     Our interactive toys are a great way to relieve stress and engage in meaningful and joyful conversations with your children. As you play and interact with your child, they develop important communication skills including the ability to explain ideas, describe their work, talk about the process and verbalize challenges that they had along the way. 

     

  • FREE Tracked Shipping to the United States, Canada, United Kingdom, Australia, New Zealand, Germany, Spain, France, Italy, Austria, Netherlands, and many more. Find out more here: Shipping Policy.

    Packaging time: 1-3 Business days

    Shipping time: Est 5-30 Business days
